backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the Nebacrypt backend with project submission management, user profile CRUD, access control, blob storage, and email integration. Defines core types (ProjectSubmission, UserProfile, Message) and exposes query/update endpoints for clients and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two completed features—removing 'Tjenester' from the nav menu and updating Internet Identity description text—to their affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, used as a build/documentation reference for the project's React frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Nebacrypt React app with Norwegian language attribute, SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter Card metadata, and a vector favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing page routing (home, portal, admin, music), authentication state, profile setup modal visibility, and scroll behavior, wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying the Nebacrypt logo, copyright bar with caffeine.ai attribution, and company contact details (org number, name, address) in a mobile-responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky responsive navigation header rendering nav items (Hjem, Musikk, Kontakt, Kundeportal, and conditionally Admin Dashboard) with Internet Identity login/logout and mobile hamburger menu; 'Tjenester' has been removed.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full-screen loading overlay showing the Nebacrypt logo with a pulse animation, a CSS spinning ring, and the Norwegian text 'Laster inn...' displayed during app initialization.
frontend/src/components/MusicTrackCard.t: A card component that renders a clickable music track link with genre, title, and artist info. Includes a utility function to parse human-readable titles from Suno URLs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects name, email, and company from new users to create their profile. Blocks dismissal until the form is submitted successfully.
frontend/src/components/PublicSubmission: A public-facing project submission form that collects client details, project description, timeline, and budget, with a success confirmation view after submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing admin access control if a token is present. Invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, project submission, and message queries. Includes a helper to refresh project-related query caches after mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that configures Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark mode design tokens including colors, borders, and chart palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page for managing project submissions, including status updates, messaging, delivery links, and tabbed views of all submissions with badge/label helpers for Norwegian-localized statuses.
frontend/src/pages/ClientPortal.tsx: Client-facing portal page allowing authenticated users (via Internet Identity) to submit projects, view their project statuses, and exchange messages with admins.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with a hero section, contact info, and navigation buttons to the client portal and music page, supporting smooth scroll to services or contact sections.
frontend/src/pages/MusicPage.tsx: Music showcase page displaying a list of tracks by 'Synthetic Agondonters' with links to Suno, a hero image, and a descriptive section about the artist concept.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with custom colors (using oklch CSS variables), fonts, border radii, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the Nebacrypt project, including two pending features: removing 'Tjenester' from the navigation menu and updating Internet Identity descriptions to reflect II 2.0 capabilities.
